name: High School Crush
description:
Welcome to my High School! This is a safe environment, where everyone can express themselves freely, without the fear of rejection or discrimination.

High School Crush aims to be a matching puzzle activity for 2-4 players. It is a local multiplayer party game that can be played on a single screen by anyone. It can also be a useful awareness tool about straight and LGBTQ+ relationships.

Can Irene break up with Kevin to be with David? Is Mary bi-sexual?
Does Jake like guys? Is Kelly a lesbian trans woman? Find out by playing the game!



The rules are simple:
• Place an affection token during your turn, to one of the students on the board.
• If 2 students have each other's tokens, they get together and you get points!
• Use the random Emotion effects to match the Perfect Couple!


Disclaimer:
The game touches on difficult subjects in a light manner. Some of these subjects are human relationships, sexual orientation and gender identity.

High School Crush is not a dating or a life simulator, therefore, some things may be represented loosely or simplified. This was done to streamline the gameplay and to familiarize the players with the basic concepts of romantic attraction.
